Text: Good sync and audio levels but the video is real choppy.  It gets around 10 FPS on my computer and my LG BD390 bluray player. Looks like there wasn't enough CPU during the encoding process. Anyone else have this problem?
What player are you using?  Mp4's never play that well on my computer when using Media Player.  GOM player has never failed.
A 7 gig, 1080p Rifftrax?  Really?  That's kinda like a gold-leaf, leather-bound issue of Mad Magazine, isn't it?

Hey, I love my gold-leaf, leather-bound Mad Magazine collection.  Also, GOM player can't play this worth a damn.  The only thing that worked well for me was KMP and it was just a little choppy on that.  I would say don't bother with this one unless you have some top of the line hardware.

http://www.rifftrax.com/donate.php
Donate if you like their stuff!
Could someone upload rifftrax of Over the Top, Star Wars:  The Phantom Menace, and Star Wars:  Attack of the Clones?
why dose it seem everyone forgets VLC media player it works great and also has a built in file repair.

Only way I could have gotten through Twilight. Please donate to these guys!
Thanks for the torrent!
